text: Beka Tsiklauri (born Tbilisi, February 9, 1989) is a Georgian rugby union player who plays as a fullback. He currently plays for Locomotive in the Georgia Championship and the Georgia national team. He has 22 caps for Georgia since his debut in 2008, with 4 tries, 11 conversions, 15 penalties and 2 drop goals scored, 93 points in aggregate. He was called for the 2015 Rugby World Cup, playing in two games and scoring a try against the All Blacks. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Rugby union players from Georgia (country) Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Tbilisi Category:Rugby union fullbacks Category:Georgia international rugby union players
title: Beka Tsiklauri
